mapper.insert:
insert into third_order( TRANSACTION_ID, OUT_TRADE_NO, OUT_TRANSACTION_ID, BANK_TYPE, FEE, RESULT_CODE, PAY_RESULT, PAY_INFO, PAY_TIME, VERSION, CHANNEL_NO, IMSI, IMEI, CELL_MODEL, SDK_VERSION, VERSION_NO
) values ( #{transaction_id}, #{out_trade_no}, #{out_transaction_id}, #{bank_type}, #{total_fee}, #{result_code}, #{pay_result}, #{pay_info}, #{time_end}, #{version}, #{channel_no}, #{imsi}, #{imei}, #{cell_model}, #{sdk_version}, #{version_no} )
mapper.select: select a.* from third_order a where a.OUT_TRADE_NO =#{ORDER_NO}
